name: One Slot Hero
description:
Made for the GMTK 2019 game jam, One Slot Hero is a game where the main character can only hold one item at a time. You must slay the dark lord to make the king a peanut butter and jelly sandwich.

Controls: Z is jump, X is pickup/drop item, C is use item, ESC will close game.

All code and art made by me, font is freesansbold.
